name: Mole Attack
overview:
Mole Attack was produced by Yachiyo Electronics in 1982.

Whack the moles when they pop their heads above ground.

Press the button that corresponds with the correct hole to whack the mole. Hit the red king mole for mystery points. The further the mole gets out of his hole before you whack him, the more points you get. If he sticks his tail out and you whack him, you will lose points.
